about.title: About Me
about.p1: As a software test engineer, I play an important role in quality software development processes. I ensure the reliability of software projects using modern testing tools and methodologies.
about.p2: I have experience in automation testing, performance testing, and API testing. With my continuous learning and development-focused approach, I keep up with innovations in technology.
about.p3: With my team-oriented, problem-solving focused, and detail-oriented working style, I contribute to the success of projects.

job1.title: Senior Test Engineer
job1.description: Developing comprehensive test strategies for web and mobile applications, managing automation test processes, and providing team leadership.

job2.title: Test Engineer
job2.description: Performing manual and automated tests, writing test scenarios, bug reporting, and preparing test documentation.

project1.title: E-Commerce Test Automation
project1.description: Comprehensive e-commerce test automation project developed using Selenium and TestNG. Test scenarios covering user registration, login, product search, and purchase processes.

project2.title: Mobile Application Testing
project2.description: Mobile application test framework developed using Cypress. Comprehensive test suite including cross-browser tests and responsive design checks.

project3.title: API Test Suite
project3.description: Comprehensive API test suite developed with REST Assured. Framework including CRUD operations, authentication, and data validation tests.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can use the channels below to get in touch with me. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
